lender.name: Rick & Avice
lender.loan_because: It makes a small difference
lender.occupational_info: Marketing Software and Designing Flowers

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I am extremely fortunate in what life has brought me and I wish to help others who have not had as much good fortune. Lending through KIVA allows me to help others help themselves over and over again.

lender.name: Craig B.
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone has the potential to do something life-changing and world-transforming.
lender.occupational_info: I serve as the pastor of a United Methodist Church.

lender.name: Fred & Marilyn
lender.loan_because: We enjoy watching people work hard and succeed.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: There is no excuse not to.
lender.occupational_info: I sell textiles for interiors in homes, hotels, offices, etc.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I would like to leave the world a better place than I found it.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a park designed to preserve and teach history.

lender.name: Kim & Alan
lender.loan_because: We'd like to do our little part in making this world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Alan fixes computer problems. Kim sells medicine to sick people.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I think this can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software for GlobalEnglish.com which teaches English on the internet.

lender.name: marybelle
lender.loan_because:
Love to be a bridge of opportunities when people deeply show an effort to make better them selfs. Me gusta ayudar a las Personas que buscan oportunidades y se esfuerzan en mejorar sus Vidas.
Feliz Navidad y que su Dios les ilumine siempre!
I love to help others like me who are looking for oportunities to better their lifes with a thrue effort.
I am Colombian from Medellin I live in USA. This country has being aboundant in opportunities, I took them all. I am so thankful and I want to share this with as many good heart people who wish to better them selfs and the world.

lender.name: Apinya
lender.loan_because: I want to help, to share, to contribute, to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Extensive work in development finance in emerging markets.

lender.name: Sofia
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I've owned and operated my own business, so I know how liberating and empowering it can be. I want to help more people create their own opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I design web pages and web applications. I work on many different web sites to help decide where the buttons go, what happens when people click on a button and what the buttons and pages look like.

lender.name: The Baker
lender.loan_because: Our family wants to participate with another family. in being successful

lender.name: Siavosh
lender.loan_because: To help others

lender.name: Sphere Foundation
lender.occupational_info: The Sphere Foundation is a nonprofit foundation striving to ensure economic and educational opportunity for everyone through lending and grantmaking.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: My life is very blessed. Everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: People helping people is what it's all about. If I can affect a change in one; I can affect a change in many.

lender.name: tobin
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people realize their dreams. A recent trip to Cambodia and Laos taught me about living everyday and how significant that is for many not as fortunate as I am.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the internet, creating sales and marketing strategies for emerging companies. I want to help change the world in some small way and I see the internet as a means to make that happen.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Being an international financier is thrilling. I feel a calling to support pubs and good cheer around the world. Restaurants and bars are a necessary respite in my daily life, I'm sure its the same everywhere.
lender.occupational_info: I have a background in restaurants/bars. Some of my favorite jobs.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is a powerful tool for potentially reducing poverty and catalyzing entrepeneurship.

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: I can. I have been blessed in my life and if I can do something for someone else, and empower them at the same time, its my obligation as a fellow human being!
lender.occupational_info: My degree is in social work (helping families get along better and parent their children more effectively), but now I sell respiratory medication to hospitals and doctors offices.

lender.name: Tess
lender.loan_because: this was a christmas gift from my mother :) i think it's a wonderful idea and i'm happy to help.
lender.occupational_info: Diploma of Tourism

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: it's great to give back! This loan was actually a Christmas gift to my mom, dad and brother....as a family we a chose a country and business to loan to.
lender.occupational_info: I have been performing in musical theatre for the past nine years. It's a great blessing to get to do what I love...dance, sing and act!

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: Helping to create and preserve jobs world-wide is the building block of peace.
lender.occupational_info: Insurance/Reinsurance consultant and dispute resolution specialist

lender.name: Chris
lender.occupational_info: I work on ways to improve the effectiveness of technology in communication and education.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: It feels good.
lender.occupational_info: My work is very rewarding.

lender.name: The Rule Family
lender.loan_because: We have enough and others don't.

lender.name: Jett
lender.loan_because: It is Very Fun, plus you can help people.

lender.name: Stussy RE
lender.loan_because: I gift these loans on behalf of my friends and clients as a part of our work together. A core purpose of my business is to support local and global humanitarian initiatives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes.

lender.name: charles & sandy
lender.loan_because: We coach couples to be able to create intentional relationship with each other and we share KIVA with them as a way to create intentional relationship with our global community.
lender.occupational_info: We work with couples to provide the ideas and tools to allow them to create their relationship in a way that will be fulfilling for them, not based on their history, the culture they grew up with or the examples they have from their parents or past relationships. It is challenging, exciting and fulfilling work, especially when a couple starts working together to create what they want in life rather than feeling stuck.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I care, it matters and that I am a much better person for it.

lender.name: The Finney Family
lender.loan_because: My wife and I care deeply about our planet and the people who call it home.
lender.occupational_info: Some people seek beauty - other people create it

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: There are some that and some that don't and I believe in "free enterprise'

lender.name: Mostly Nolands
lender.loan_because: we want to connect with people from other parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are teachers, computer workers, social workers, and retired.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I've been helping change the world since before I could walk.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: It is interesting and hopefully helpful
lender.occupational_info: Provide medical care to pets (mostly cats and dogs).

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: we are happy to help others.
lender.occupational_info: We are three girls who work hard in school, sports and music.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I trust KIVA. It feels personal. Who wouldn't help a neighbor, even one a world away?

lender.name: Meghan
lender.occupational_info: I'm a University student.

lender.name: Tristan
lender.loan_because: we all have responsibilities to each other in our global community. There are few better gifts than to help someone help themselves.

lender.name: MINEO
lender.loan_because: SIMPLE...BECAUSE I HAVE THE ABILITY TO HELP SOME ONE THAT NEEDS HELP...
lender.occupational_info: STRESSFUL

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: its needed
lender.occupational_info: Busters Barbeque - Smoked meats and Award winning Busters Blueberry BBQ sauce.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I hope that my contributions can help change or improve the lives of those I donate to.

lender.name: sandi
lender.loan_because: I feel tha it is important to support others. It is part of acknowledging that we are here as a part of an interconnected and interreliable whole.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur who has been very fortunate to have received much help and guidance from others, I feel the need to "pay it forward" to entrepreneurs in need. I am inspired by the accomplishments and ambitions of the entrepreneurs on Kiva.org
lender.occupational_info: I started my 5th internet company, the Rubicon Project, in early 2007. We provide an easy to use service for websites of all sizes make money from their ad space.

lender.name: Kriosa
lender.loan_because: I want to give others an opportunity to help themselves and others.
lender.occupational_info: I create designs to beautify streets, to provide enjoyment, to clean the water and air, and help the environment.

lender.name: Wilbert & Jeanette
lender.loan_because: I like to help people realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: enjoying retirement

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: I feel good to be able to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I take payments from people that buy merchandise on credit. It is all done on a computer.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I aspire to help people who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: For a small fee (for my time) I bring pleasure to women of the world.

lender.name: Alex from Vancouver
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I am in school, planning to become a successful business man.

lender.occupational_info: I produce Music, FIlm & Video to share stories, ideas and feelings that help us know each other and ourselves at the same time. Also design many web sites for interesting humans!

lender.name: cheryl
lender.loan_because: we need to take care of others and because the stories are so compelling.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Even a small difference makes a difference, and besides... it's kinda fun

lender.name: Nikolas Douventzidis
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I'm a college student studying engineering

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Everyone Should, it's not our gift, it's our duty.

lender.name: Collin
lender.loan_because: With a genius idea like Kiva, the possibilities are endless. The benefits to both the lender and the entrepreneur far outweigh the risks of this program, and contributing to this cause can only do good in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school sophmore (11th year student) in the United States.

lender.name: Dawne
lender.loan_because: I can!!!

lender.name: Alvanos/Novotney Family
lender.loan_because: WE loan because we strongly believe the standard of living for all of this world's people should be equal. As a family community we wish to provide others with the opportunity to better their lives, and in turn the lives of others in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: We have many different occupations in our family. There are students, financial advisers, hair dressers, engineers, teachers, and many more...

lender.name: Noah
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who experience discrimination.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for generosity I have been shown. I want to pass my good fortune on to others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people all over the U.S. how to use the medical office software sold by my employers to improve healthcare for children.

lender.name: Cody
lender.occupational_info: I go to school, and over the summer guide people down rapids in inflatable rafts.

lender.name: Andrew

lender.occupational_info: I help families work through their legal problems.

lender.loan_because: The Federation stresses the values of universal liberty, equality, justice, peace and cooperation.

lender.occupational_info: aspiring to become an elementary school teacher.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: honestly I received a gift certificate for Christmas!

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I want to support those people who are working towards their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I work in Online Advertising

lender.name: Cameron
lender.loan_because: in my experience it is the best way to really help.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and her friends make the Best Spring Rolls on the Planet! ... and More. I manage the wholesale business of Saigon Soul Food.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic way to support someone that really needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I find and help report the news in my home for television broadcasts.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: warwick clark
lender.loan_because: it makes things a bit less random

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: it can break the cycle of poverty. Plus you get your loan back. Helping people with almost zero effort and risk, why wouldn't you do it?

lender.name: Rajat
lender.loan_because: Its an honor to lend a helping hand to those wanting to invest their heart and hopes for a better future.
lender.occupational_info: My work is in the area of research and development of software

lender.name: Elke
lender.loan_because: i care

lender.name: Leslie E.
lender.loan_because: I've been given a lot, just because of where I was born and the family & nation to which I belong. As God has given freely to me, so should I freely give.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I can afford to help a little and in turn, with other lenders, it helps someone out a lot!

lender.name: Mauricio V
lender.loan_because: I fully support helping those that are willing to help themselves.

lender.name: Sandeep
lender.loan_because: I believe happiness exists through sharing.
lender.occupational_info: I teach marketing at an US university. I also do research in International Marketing and consumer behavior (psychology).

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: It is painful and frustrating to watch so much suffering throughout the world but it is a privilege to be able to help a little in this ingenious way. Those I help should know that they help me in return.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: T + K
lender.loan_because: To help entrepreneurs

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I get a really good feeling thinking that I can help somebody improve their living conditions and help an impoverished family.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired now.

lender.name: sheila
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I want to help others realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help Colleges plan future programs and facilities to help students get the best education possible.

lender.name: Hoda
lender.loan_because: "It is not power that corrupts, but fear. Fear of losing power corrupts those who wield it and fear of the scourge of power corrupts those who are subject to it."

lender.name: Hari
lender.loan_because: I'm just glad to share my good fortune with others.

lender.name: 7 Coffee Roasters
lender.loan_because: hard work should be the great equalizer in this world. Kiva is helping to make this possible.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to be as fortunate as me.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I am a returned Peace Corps Volunteer that lived and taught in Benin, West Africa. I like microfinance because it is a means that people help themselves, rather than me just giving my money away.
lender.occupational_info: I use a computer to tell other machines what to do. For example, I use a computer to tell a machine when to turn on its lights.

lender.name: Glen Lancaster
lender.loan_because: I fell in love with the people of Cambodia and want to help them improve their lives after so many horrific years.

lender.name: Camille
lender.loan_because: i love the life !

lender.name: KALLISTI
lender.loan_because: I know that a little help isn't always so little.
lender.occupational_info: I work with and on Internet.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Sigbj√∏rn
lender.loan_because: I believe it is one of the best ways to contribute to greater prosperity in less developed regions of the world.

lender.name: Adnan/Naureen
lender.loan_because:
Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
Micro loans are the equivalent of teaching someone to fish. Giving them a kick-start in life so they could go on towards greater things in life. We love the idea of helping someone who is willing to help themselves which would hopefully create a ripple affect of self sufficiency in their own community.
lender.occupational_info: Adnan manages a TV channel while Naureen works in financial management.

lender.name: Isoda
lender.loan_because: the donation, grant assistance, could not change the society, in cases, may spoil the society with passion, sincerity and responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: Environment Management for EIA

lender.name: joel
lender.loan_because:
Wealth is defined by how much you can afford to give to those less fortunate than yourself-
A hand extended to a stranger in friendship & help is more powerful than the largest army or corporation
lender.occupational_info: Off the grid in Hawaiian Acres (Powered by the Sun), 8 miles from an active Volcano, employed in pure astronomy, from the summit of Mauna Kea, Hawaii

lender.name: Heidi
lender.occupational_info: Learning new things about history, improving my writing, learning how the world works, and getting more skilled with math.

lender.name: G√ºnter & Renate
lender.loan_because: We are happy about helping these entrepreneurs and their families. We hope they are able to improve their standard of living and to send their children to school.

lender.name: Lars and Sju
lender.loan_because: Business is freedom

lender.name: Henk
lender.loan_because: I feel embarrasingly rich - having just come back from three weeks fieldwork in Mali and Burkina Faso. I know how lucky I am to have been born where I was - and I would like to help a few others to make their own life lucky, too.
lender.occupational_info: I work on wild African plants, writing books on how to recognize them; where they grow, and how they are used in the countries where they grow.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: Sometimes you have to make opportunities.

lender.name: Pepe and Paloma
lender.loan_because: We loan because it gets boring to sleep, eat and play all day.
lender.occupational_info: Our dad makes plans to build roads

lender.loan_because: I believe in helping each other
lender.occupational_info: technical artist/photographer

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: Luke 12:48

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: Being Australian, I believe everyone deserves a fair go. I encourage and reward effort and I believe in leading by doing.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the opportunity to improve their lives.

lender.name: juicycomrade
lender.loan_because: Easy way to make a difference~ and it's cool.
lender.occupational_info: Student at Kyung Hee Univ.

lender.occupational_info: I support goods and services to companies we sell our products too.

lender.name: tom√°s
lender.loan_because: Sometimes we all need a little help and I like to help people to have a better life.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I am unbelievably fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children about the world through foreign language. I also coordinate the International Baccalaureate Programme in an effort to teach our students about a world outside our borders.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Started as a Christmas gift to me, and I think exemplifies the spirit of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a nurse and take care of sick people.

lender.name: Jamie & Aaron
lender.occupation: Animal Shelter Director & Heavy Equipment Operator
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I help animals.

lender.name: Dick
lender.loan_because: I want to support a few other people in the hope they themselves will follow my example as soon as they are able to do so.

lender.name: Sue Mason
lender.loan_because: i love to see people have a chance to help their families and have a better life! My family raises chickens and goats so we especially like to lend to people who are in agriculture.
lender.occupational_info: My work helps sick people get stronger again! I love to work with children and older people!

lender.loan_because: Love entrepreneurship, come from a family that has come to embody the American Dream of ownership and success.
lender.occupational_info: CEO and President of two food distribution companies in New York.
